contents.text: Welcome to FreeWire Technologies in the East Bay, where we empower you with on-demand clean power beyond the electrical grid.
For information about our mobile charging and power solutions, press 1.
To learn about our portable electric vehicle charging solutions, press 1.
Thank you for your interest in our portable EV charging. Please hold while we connect you to a specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to rent a portable EV charger for a company event next week.
I want information on renting or buying a portable EV charger, including pricing.
I’m interested in the technical specifications and integration options of your portable EV charging unit for my fleet.
I’d like to know how to rent and set up a portable EV charger so I can charge my car at home.
I’d like detailed specifications and pricing options for your portable EV chargers for a physics lab project.

contents.text: To inquire about site and utility-scale power deployments, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our grid independence solutions team.

navigationGoals: I'd like a quote and timeline for installing a utility-scale clean power system at our headquarters.
I'm interested in deploying a large-scale off-grid power solution for my veterans' community center.
I’d like to discuss capacity planning and deployment architectures for a grid-independent power system at our commercial site.
I want to inquire about installing a home backup power system to keep the lights on during outages.
I’m researching utility-scale on-demand clean power deployments and need information about your site-scale solutions.

contents.text: For customer support and service inquiries, press 2.
For technical assistance with your FreeWire systems, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our technical support department.

navigationGoals: My Portable Charger MX unit is showing an error code and I need help troubleshooting it immediately.
I need technical assistance with my FreeWire system; it's not charging correctly.
I need troubleshooting assistance for firmware update failures and network connectivity issues on my FreeWire charger.
I need help troubleshooting an error on my FreeWire charging unit.
I need technical support to troubleshoot and optimize my FreeWire charging unit’s performance.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and accounts team.

navigationGoals: I need to review and update my billing details and clarify a recent invoice charge.
I want to update my payment method and review my latest bill for my FreeWire service.
I want to review the line-item breakdown on my latest usage-based billing and update my payment details.
I’d like to review my recent charging bill and update my payment information.
I have questions about the billing details and charges on my latest charging service invoice.
